### Read Some Text

```{r echo=FALSE}

document <- as.character(fa("file", fill = "#e86af0", height = "25px"))

book <- as.character(fa("book", fill = "#f06ab5", height = "25px"))

site <- as.character(fa("link", fill = "	#a56af0", height = "25px"))

review <- tibble(
  
  title <- c("<i>Reducing Peoples Reluctance to Respond to Surveys</i>"
  ),
  
  section = c("Chapter 2"),
  
  link <- c(
    paste0("[",book,"]",
    "(https://ebookcentral.proquest.com/lib/wvu/reader.action?docID=1762797&ppg=39){target='_blank'}"
    )
    
  ),
  
  .name_repair = "minimal"
  
)

```

<center>
```{r, echo=FALSE}
review %>%
  mutate_all(replace_na,"") %>%
  kbl(col.names = c("Title", 
                    "Section",
                    "Link"), 
      "html", 
      escape = FALSE,
      align = 'llc') %>%
   kable_paper(full_width = TRUE) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "20em") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "10em") %>% 
  row_spec(0:nrow(review), extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;', color = "#f7f7f7", background = "transparent") 
```
</center>

### Read A Paper

```{r echo=FALSE}

pdf_link1 <- function() {
 paste0("<a href='/files/Week%202/Sullivan%20&%20Artino%20(2017).pdf' target='_blank'>", "<img src='/logos/pdf-ico.png' alt='Slack icon' width='40'>", "</a>")
}

readings <- tibble(
  
  paper <- c("Sullivan, G. M., & Artino, A. R., Jr (2017). How to Create a Bad Survey Instrument. <i>Journal of Graduate Medical Education 9</i>(4). 411â€“415. <a href=' https://doi.org/10.4300/JGME-D-17-00375.1' target='_blank'>https://doi.org/10.4300/JGME-D-17-00375.1 </a>"
  ),
 

  download <- c(
    pdf_link1()

```

<center>
```{r, echo=FALSE}
readings %>%
  kbl(col.names = c("Source", "Link"), 
      "html", 
      escape = FALSE,
```
